title: Theismann on Cannabis, Cryptos and Kansas City
itunes:title: Theismann on Cannabis, Cryptos and Kansas City
description:
Former NFL Quarterback Joe Theismann discusses why investors are nervous with the current market environment. He talks about the benefits of long-term investing and being diversified. Also participating in the discussion is former NFL Coach Brian Billick talking about Sunday's big game.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
